title: 6 PC GPUs That Are Similar (or Better) Than The PlayStation 5

steps.title: The PS5 GPU is a special gaming GPU made by AMD.
steps.content: The PS5 GPU is a special gaming GPU made by AMD. Since the PS5 is a console and not a computer, the GPU (which is named Oberon) can output better framerates and VRAM versus a traditional PC GPU. [1] X Research source Architecture: RDNA 2.0 VRAM: 16 GB GDDR6 Performance (FP32): 10.29 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 2.23 GHz DirectX: Not supported Release Date: November 12, 2020 Launch Price: $499 USD

steps.title: AMD Radeon RX 6700
steps.content: AMD Radeon RX 6700 . The RX 6700 has less VRAM and a slightly slower base clock speed, but it has slightly better performance overall. [2] X Research source Architecture: RDNA 2.0 VRAM: 10 GB GDDR6 Performance (FP32): 11.29 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 1.94 GHz base speed, 2.17 GHz game clock speed, 2.45 GHz boost clock speed DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: June 9th, 2021 Launch Price: $479 USD

steps.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
steps.content: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 . The GeForce RTX 3070 is a comparable NVIDIA GPU to the AMD Oberon. It's hard to find an NVIDIA GPU that matches all of the specs of the Oberon, but the RTX 3070 sacrifices a little memory and speed for much higher performance at the same launch price. [3] X Research source Architecture: Ampere VRAM: 8 GB GDDR6 Performance (FP32): 20.31 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 1.5 GHz base speed, 1.72 Ghz boost clock speed DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: September 1st, 2020 Launch Price: $499 USD

steps.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 16 GB
steps.content: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 16 GB . A newer GPU with similar VRAM and clock speeds to the Oberon, but with much higher performance. [4] X Research source Architecture: Ada Lovelace VRAM: 16 GB GDDR6 Performance (FP32): 22.06 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 2.31 GHz base speed, 2.53 GHz boost clock speed DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: May 18th, 2023 Launch Price: $499 USD

steps.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER
steps.content: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER . A 2024 NVIDIA release that has slightly less memory and base clock speed, but a major increase in GPU performance. Architecture: Ada Lovelace VRAM: 12 GB GDDR6X Performance (FP32): 35.48 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 1.98 GHz base speed, 2.47 GHz boost clock speed DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: January 8th, 2024 Launch Price: $599 USD

steps.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070.
steps.content: Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070. One of the newest entry in the all-new Blackwell architecture, featuring DLSS 4 and Multi Frame Generation. Despite being slightly more expensive and having less VRAM, it is still much faster and has much better specs than the PS5's Oberon GPU. [5] X Research source Architecture: Blackwell VRAM: 12 GB GDDR7 Performance (FP32): 30.87 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 2.33 GHz base speed, 2.51 GHz boost clock speed DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: March 4th, 2025 Launch Price: $549 USD

steps.title: AMD Radeon RX 7700 XT
steps.content: AMD Radeon RX 7700 XT . A high-end AMD GPU that's similar to the NVIDIA RTX 4070 Super in specs and outperforms the Oberon. [6] X Research source Architecture: RDNA 3.0 VRAM: 12 GB GDDR6 Performance (FP32): 35.17 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 1.43 GHz base speed, 2.17 GHz game clock speed, 2.54 GHz boost clock speed DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: August 25th, 2023 Launch Price: $449 USD

steps.title: AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT
steps.content: AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT . Another entry in the RX 7000 series, the RX 7800 XT is another great choice that has the same launch price as the PS5's Oberon but with higher specs. [7] X Research source Architecture: RDNA 3.0 VRAM: 16 GB GDDR6 Performance (FP32): 37.32 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 1.29 GHz base speed, 2.12 GHz game clock speed, 2.43 GHz boost clock speed DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: August 25th, 2023 Launch Price: $499 USD

steps.title: AMD Radeon RX 9070.
steps.content: AMD Radeon RX 9070. A great launch based on all-new RDNA 4. Not only it has much better specs than the PS5's Oberon GPU, but it has FSR 4, an all-new upscaler driven by AI. [8] X Research source Architecture: RDNA 4.0 VRAM: 16 GB GDDR6 Performance (FP32): 36.13 TFLOPS Clock Speed: 1.33 GHz base speed, 2.07 GHz game clock speed, 2.52 GHz boost DirectX: Up to 12 Ultimate Release Date: March 6th, 2025 Launch Price: $549 USD
